name: SleepNoiseFan
0:
”Alexa, open sleep noise fan”
”Alexa, start sleep noise fan”
”Alexa, launch sleep noise fan”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep noise fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Noise Fan lets you reproduce calming fan audio tracks to help you fall asleep, concentrate or study.
To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram!
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
